request.docs: This endpoint creates a subproject under the project whose API token and ID is being used.

This route is present to be API compatible with other providers, but since authentication on SignalWire is specific to a Project, this endpoint will return a list that contains only the Project you are connecting as.
Allows you to change the name of the project used in authentication
Creates a new application within the project used for authentication
Optional FriendlyName parameter to choose a specific one by name

items.name: List Available Phone Number Resources by Country

request.docs: Returns a list of URIs to phone number resources available to the account in the US ISO country, categorized by type (Local, Toll-Free, Mobile, etc).

items.name: List All Media of a Fax
Create a Message with a Presigned URL
Retrieve Members Waiting in a Queue
